description:
After having numerous individuals on Reddit asking me about my breasts and behaving low key weird... like asking me for photos of my current bras to try and help me with fitting, asking what I was going to do with my old bras, or straight out offering to pay me for them... I wondered if there were others out there who felt the same.  And to my luck, during a recent conversation with a friend, she told me about this site!  So here I am.  Bra's are SUPER expensive and if I can make $$$ for this old bra, all the more help when buying new ones.

            So, I've always had proportionately huge boobs... at least for as long as I can remember.  They actually didn't start growing so much that it became an issue until college.  In high school I wasn't even the girl with the biggest chest or anything like that.  But since freshmen year, they've continued to grow to the 32P I find myself at today.

            This particular bra is actually a 32N and while it was one of my favorites because of the way it fit my breasts so well, I've outgrown it!  I think my breasts are slightly changing shape and becoming more pendulous the larger they get and the older I get.  So I was so thankful that this bra has plenty of room in the cups.  And despite it's use, the wires have never broken on me!
